Articles.Content:
between today and tomorrow the first photo of the planets of Expancion to the stars comes to light.

so stay tuned since news is also coming to talk and more in the forum after this one

 

Sketches of the other stars will also be shown after Aprif and Courye, who have already confirmed the star number is 7, many planets being created without texture, names of moons, binary planets (spoilers if there are any), stellar systems already configuring things, future projects, names and stellar bodies, AND MUCH MUCH MORE!

COME ON BE CAREFUL I'M GETTING EARLY BECAUSE OF THIS!
